lines.text: Hi, Harry. How ya doin', huh? Nice of you to drop by.
Rico? Yeah, long gone, man. Would you stay partners with some scumbag slimeball who would badmouth ya, steal from ya and try to screw your wife?
You know what I like about you, Johnny?

[narrating]
Standing at the foot of the bed menacing Shannon, the only woman I would ever love, was a total mega-psycho dirtbag, one Johnny Staccato, a really bad goodfella wiseguy gangster-type dude... and his partner, Rico, was even worse.
